subheader: A project showcasing the history of the EU
subheader-mobile:
A project showcasing the
history of the EU
about: This project tries to visualize the historical and mostly political events of the European Union since World War II. My main goal was to provide enough visual material to showcase the innovations & events of the EU without much explanation. For this, I used various graphs and charts along with some minor explanatory sketch. Feel free to raise an issue at my GitHub page if you find any inaccuracy.
resolution-error: Apologies, but we currently do not support your screen resolution.
